channel.title: Liwei (Tony) Jiang's Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content on Liwei (Tony) Jiang's Personal Website

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, dear visitor! Nice to e-meet you! Thank you for your visit! This is Liwei (Tony) Jiang’s personal website (Shout out to Joe Bahr, who helps me build this website! The best R tutor!!). I am from a small northern town in China. Interestingly, the English translation of my hometown’s name is New York (This is 100% true!!). I am a graduate student of public policy with energy and environment concentration at Duke University Sanford School of Public Policy, graduating in May 2023.

item.title: How to Stop Rat Race in China
item.description: In this blog, I will try to explain why rat race becomes prevalent in China’ labor market using economic and game theory concepts. Them, I will introduce potential policy implications of this issue.
